plot: Far from her homeland of Cuba, Dido Belle now has to make a life for herself in 18th century London with no family or friends.
title: Dido Belle
plot_es: Far from her homeland of Cuba, Dido Belle now has to make a life for herself in 18th century London with no family or friends.
plot_en: Far from her homeland of Cuba, Dido Belle now has to make a life for herself in 18th century London with no family or friends.
